title: Queue Reconstruction by Height
content:
You are given an array of people, , which are the attributes of some people in a queue (not necessarily in order). Each  represents the  person of height  with exactly  other people in front who have a height greater than or equal to .
Reconstruct and return the queue that is represented by the input array . The returned queue should be formatted as an array , where  is the attributes of the  person in the queue ( is the person at the front of the queue).
 




 





It is guaranteed that the queue can be reconstructed.
